mapper.insert: insert into userinfo ( phone_num, nickname, headimg_url, position, longitude, sex, latitude, cDate, mDate, user_id) values ( #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update userinfo
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
